main.name: Akor Sunday
main.bio: A smart and highly dedicated analytical Research Professional with over 5-years experience in Programme Monitoring & Evaluation, focused on deriving meaningful insights from data and using it to help organizations to make powerful decisions so as to improve operations and consumer impact. With a strong academic background, I have a strong ambition to pursue a professional career in developmental and humanitarian services with a long-standing goal of working in Monitoring and Evaluation. I am highly motivated and focused with a strong passion for excellence and I seek to be part of an organization where my skills and competencies can be utilized.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be part of your team

address.street: No. 19 Chief Palace Guest House,Hospital Road, Karu Site

education.description: Graduated with Second Class Honours(Upper Division)

work.title: Social worker
work.description: Impacting lives and communities and the less priviledge. On the way to change the world positively by building society through Good Leadership.

projects.title: Reaching and Empowering Adolescents towards making informed Choices (REACH)
The Education Partnership Centre
projects.category: Final Evaluation of Girls Education Programme 2012-2020 in Northern Nigeria

testimonials.text: Working with Akor has been AWESOME, he makes learning and working on projects so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
Akor is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Akor is team worker and easy to work with, He works hard and smartly too
testimonials.user: Hannah Aaron, Community Information and Advocacy Initiative
